definition: to speak/to talk/to converse/to chat/to discuss

sentences.english: Even the Chinese government hesitates to talk about censorship.
sentences.chinese: 即使中国政府谈及审查制度含糊其辞。

sentences.english: We refer to our Order No. 532 for women's blouses and sweaters.
sentences.chinese: 兹谈及我方532号女式衬衫及毛衣的订单。

sentences.english: John is talking to a furniture store clerk about buying a new living room set.
sentences.chinese: 约翰正和家具店店员谈及要买一套新客厅家具的事。

sentences.english: He spoke without the Microsoft-designed computerised charts and bullet points.
sentences.chinese: 而他却没有谈及微软设计的电脑图表和要点。

sentences.english: The topic I want to talk about is the permission to be human.
sentences.chinese: 我谈及的话题是准许为人。

sentences.english: Obviously, this is from the area of business that is talked about in the area of e-business sales.
sentences.chinese: 很明显，这是从商业领域即销售领域谈及的电子商务。

sentences.english: Mooney spoke about the reasons behind what he calls American inaction on climate change.
sentences.chinese: 莫涅谈及了美国对气候变化无动于衷的原因。

sentences.english: I tried to talk about the problem with friends.
sentences.chinese: 我试图去跟一些朋友谈及这个问题。

sentences.english: IT IS not difficult to be pessimistic about the future of European business.
sentences.chinese: 谈及欧洲未来的经济状况，总是让人觉得愁云惨淡。

sentences.english: But when it comes to command of global markets, the U.S. owns the service sector.
sentences.chinese: 但谈及全球市场的占有量时，美国拥有服务市场。

sentences.english: When we speak of one person or thing, we use the positive degree.
sentences.chinese: 当谈及一个人或事时，使用形容词的原级形式。

sentences.english: Since the days of son for empathetic.
sentences.chinese: 谈及儿子连日以来为情所困。

sentences.english: Wear old speak about oneself to break to translate antecedents, the regrets is very many.
sentences.chinese: 戴老谈及自己破译经历，感慨良多。

sentences.english: When it came to the future of humanity, Kubrick was never much of an optimist.
sentences.chinese: 当谈及人类的未来，库布里克并没多么乐观。

sentences.english: Going home to visit his parents in rural China, Jianqiang Liu did not expect to have a discussion about global warming.
sentences.chinese: 刘鉴强起初没有想到要和母亲谈及全球变暖的话题。

sentences.english: No one touched on this topic.

definition: to refer to/to speak about/to talk about
to express/to show/to say/to state/to indicate/to mean
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to bring to sb's attention
to mention/to raise (a subject)/to refer to
to interview/to gather news/to hunt for and collect/to cover
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
